JONNY DAVIES
Hard working, enthusiastic individual that works well individually or part of a team. I am an
apprentice time served precision engineer and have worked in the industry for or the past 15
years.
For the past 7 years I have been working on the sales side of the industry actively looking for new
business or sustaining relationships with key customers.
In the time that I have been working in sales I have also had to project manage key projects that
I have won from new customers, this involved giving weekly updates to the customer via project
plans, sub contracting operations to various subcontractors, Chasing updated from
subcontractors to make sure on time deliveries are on schedule.
I believe that I create good relationships with existing or potentially new customers resulting in
repeat work.
